Sully Yoon

Bio

Sulchan (Sully) Yoon

I am a developer in many platforms and an enthusiast of photography and cars. I find that user experience is crucial in all fields of work.

Developer

Optimization and UX

I am a curious and experimental developer. I enjoy work that challenges the bounds as it always helps in growing and staying relavant. I create automated scripts that assist in providing the least amount of lag time.

Car Enthusiast

Builds and AutoX

I have a passion for driving and building cars. I have worked on a Mazda RX-7 FC, Hyundai Gensis, and my current Subaru BRZ.

Photographer

Cars and Landscape

I love to wander to the quiet depths of the mountains. I enjoy the epic views provided by the mountains and forests with goals to visit major mountain regions all around the world.
